My HM126 has been a great investment. Our first project was to cut 2” x 6” oak planks for a facelift to our existing house. The next job was milling all the lumber for our new 26’ x 34’ detached garage. Milling the garage trusses saved $5,500 alone. The Mill has performed without flaw throughout its current 34.3 hours of runtime. Thoughtfully designed with sturdy materials and detailed, well laid out manuals to boot.
